short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage notes and set reminders with alarms and notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Notes and Reminders is a practical tool designed to help users stay organized and never miss important tasks or events. With this extension, users can easily create and manage notes and set reminders directly within their Chrome browser. Whether it’s a quick note, a to-do list, or an important deadline, this extension makes it effortless to stay on top of everything.

The extension allows users to add reminders for specific days or set daily recurring reminders at a chosen hour. For instance, if you need a reminder every day at 8 AM, the extension will trigger an alert at that exact time, ensuring you’re always on track. Additionally, the feature to set reminders for a specific day allows users to plan for upcoming events, tasks, or meetings without the fear of forgetting them.

All your notes and reminders are stored locally, ensuring your data stays private and accessible only to you. The simple interface makes it easy to create, edit, or delete reminders and notes in just a few clicks.

Ideal for professionals, students, and anyone looking to improve their productivity, the Notes and Reminders Extension is a lightweight, easy-to-use tool that integrates seamlessly with your daily browsing routine. No more missing deadlines or forgetting important tasks—this extension helps you stay organized, every day!
